att.citeStructurePart

provides attributes for selecting particular elements within a document.
Moduleheader â€” The TEI header
MembersciteData citeStructure
Attributes
@use
supplies an XPath selection pattern using the syntax defined in 1 . The XPath pattern is relative to the context given in match, which will either be a sibling attribute in the case of citeStructure or on the parent citeStructure in the case of citeData.
Usage
req
Datatype
teidata.xpath
